name: BlockIO Cloud Wallet Adapter
description: Allows your Bitcoin and Altcoin Wallets WordPress plugin to interface with your block.io cloud wallet account.

name: CoinPayments Adapter
description: Allows your Bitcoin and Altcoin Wallets WordPress plugin to interface with your CoinPayments.net cloud wallet account.

name: Full Node Multi Coin Adapter
description: Allows the Bitcoin and Altcoin Wallets WordPress plugin to connect to a large number of Bitcoin-like full node wallets via their JSON RPC API.
